q: In my clear opinion, Larry Page is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come,'' Eric Schmidt said. comScore, Google's sites reached nearly 179 million unique users in November, ranking second only behind Yahoo's. Google accounts for 66 percent of all U.S. searches-and essentially has become a verb in the English language meaning to search the Web. Even more impressive is Google's otherworldly revenue growth over the past decade under Eric Schmidt .
